participant_1.background:
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.
My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con.
I started a blog where I share my thoughts and feelings on topics I am passionate about.
I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad.
I'm not sure if I could be a fashion designer if I were blind, because I would have a hard time seeing the colors and textures of fabrics.

participant_2.background:
I want to learn how to hike more efficiently with my family.
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.
i love pizza.
I will continue to care for my mom and take walks with my dog.
My family supports me while I pursue my writing career.

content.text: Hey! I'm a writer and blogger. What do you do?
Hi! I'm a writer too! I hope to get published someday.
That's awesome! What do you like to write about?
Mostly fiction, but I'm also trying to break into nonfiction.
Cool! I love writing fiction too. I'm trying to get better at writing nonfiction.
That's awesome! What kind of things do you like to write about?
I love writing about people and their stories. I also love writing about travel and food.
That's awesome! I love writing about people too. I also love writing about my family and friends.
That's great! I love writing about my family and friends too.
It's so nice to meet someone who loves to write!
It's nice to meet you too! I'm glad I found someone who shares my passion for writing.
